title: the apple iPhone font???
content:
hi guys,

Does anyone know what font they use for the apple iphone imac typography etc

many thanks
author: koopdoggedawg

comments.content: Apple usually uses Myriad for everything, from advertising to packaging.
The interface on the iPhone is Helvetica, though, and the OS X system font is Lucida Grande.
And the Helevetica is slightly modified too. The number 1 is an example.
How is the 1 modified? It looks like every other Helvetica 1 I've seen before.
They look the same to me, except on the real iPhone, the 1 is proportional when it's big like that (not at text sizes).
